title: Carolina Spirit
features: The untimely loss of her true love throws a young widow into a deep depression, while leaving her teen daughter to fend for herself.Gracie misses her father desperately, and deeply unsettled by the rumors, she sets out to seek the circumstances behind his tragic death. The imbalance in their home awakens a ghostly energy that refuses to let go of Gracie, pushing her to the edge.As this presence grows more insistent, her best friend Gus worries about her state of mind and the future becomes unclear for them all.Growing up southern on an island off the coast of South Carolina stitches a tapestry of rich characters and endless outdoor adventures. Leading to a surprising conclusion that will leave you shedding a tear or two, laughing out loud and clapping your hands for the brave, unforgettable and resourceful inhabitants of Lady’s Island named Gracie, and Gus.
description: "If you grew up in South Carolina, or if you wish you did, put this book on your must-read list. You will smell the salt marsh, you will feel the sand between your toes, you will recognize the clay on your shoes, and you will recall what it is like to be back, enjoying a family picnic on the sand in a National Wildlife refuge, or spending a sizzling hot summer day at a farmer's market." "I love everything about this book. It's what I like to call a literary triple threat. Great writing. Great story. Great Characters. Bibiana Krall's Carolina Spirit: A Tale From the Lowcountry sings. As far as words go, Carolina Spirit has a rhythm that draws you in, wraps itself around you, and holds on tight."
Have you ever lost someone you loved dearly and didn't know how to go on? Meet Gracie and understand that there is eternal hope, and a deep beauty in the struggle.

Official Website BIBIANAKRALL.COMBibiana Krall is an American author living blissfully inside the stories she creates. A wanderer, a dreamer and humanist, she writes with a slight nod to her life experiences. Joined in this journey are her brilliant husband, two super cool Gen Z's that keep her hip and a duo of curious goldfish named Frank & Tank.
